mapper.sql: id, reply, like_count, state, user_account_id, reply_to_user_account_id, feed_info_id, feed_comment_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into comment_reply (id, reply, like_count, state, user_account_id, reply_to_user_account_id, feed_info_id, feed_comment_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyToUserAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedCommentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

reply,

state,

feed_info_id,

mapper.update:
update comment_reply
reply = #{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_account_id = #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reply_to_user_account_id = #{replyToUserAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feed_info_id = #{feedInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feed_comment_id = #{feedCommentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update comment_reply set reply = #{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_account_id = #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reply_to_user_account_id = #{replyToUserAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feed_info_id = #{feedInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feed_comment_id = #{feedCommentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.reply, r.like_count, r.state, r.user_account_id, r.reply_to_user_account_id, r.feed_info_id, r.feed_comment_id, r.create_time, u.id uid, u.nickname unickname, u2.id rid, u2.nickname rnickname from comment_reply r left join user_account u on r.user_account_id = u.id left join user_account u2 on r.reply_to_user_account_id = u2.id where r.id = #{commentId}

select r.id, r.reply, r.like_count, r.state, r.user_account_id, r.reply_to_user_account_id, r.feed_info_id, r.feed_comment_id, r.create_time, u.id uid, u.nickname unickname, u2.id rid, u2.nickname rnickname from comment_reply r left join user_account u on r.user_account_id = u.id left join user_account u2 on r.reply_to_user_account_id = u2.id where r.feed_comment_id in #{item}
order by r.create_time desc limit #{start}, #{offset}
